name:
Flower Class - SPRING NEST
January 7th, 2014 at 7:00pm
description: Are you longing for spring and the return of warmer days? Let us help you feel inspired! Join Blooms of Hope, owner and lead designer, Nicole Pirani for a one-night tutorial to learn how to create a more traditional style arrangement using Oasis foam. Your design will consist of tulips and alstroemeria with greenery and thistle accents all tightly packed in a rustic nest. Price includes all materials, use of design tools and your creation to take home. Classes are approximately one hour long and will be held at Blooms of Hope's studio, 25 Flanders Road in Belmont, MA. Class Date: Tuesday, January 7th, 2014 at 7:00pm

name:
Flower Class - SPRING NEST
January 10th, 2014 at 7:00pm

name:
Flower Class - FLORAL PURSE
January 11th, 2014 at 10:00am
description: Small textured flowers can be used along with Oasis foam to create 3-D floral art in many shapes. Join Blooms of Hope, owner and lead designer, Nicole Pirani for a one-night tutorial to learn how to make an adorable and fun floral purse. Using ribbons, small accents and flowers, you will be able to take home a unique, personalized design. Perfect for the handbag lover in you or in your life! Price include all materials, use of design tools and your creation to take home. Classes are approximately one hour long and will be held at Blooms of Hope's studio, 25 Flanders Road in Belmont, MA. Class Date: Saturday, January 11th 2014 at 10:00am

name:
Flower Class - FLOWERS 101
January 14th, 2014 at 7:00pm
description: An introduction to the fresh cut flowers available to us year round at the market. Join Blooms of Hope, owner and lead designer, Nicole Pirani for a one-night tutorial and create a basic vase arrangement in a 6" glass cylinder. You will use and learn about basic blooms like roses, hydrangea, carnations, snapdragons, stock, gerber daisies, mums, and dendrobium orchids as well as some common fillers and greens. Price include all materials, use of design tools and your arrangement to take home. Classes are approximately one hour long and will be held at Blooms of Hope's studio, 25 Flanders Road in Belmont, MA. Class Date: Tuesday, January 14th, 2014 at 7:00pm

name: CUSTOM FLORAL DESIGN PARTY
description: Blooms of Hope, owner and lead designer, Nicole Pirani will come to your home and lead a floral design class for you and 5 of your guests. You and Nicole will choose the design, date and time that works. She will bring all the materials, tools to your house, set-up, teach the class and clean up.  Design portion of class will take approximately an hour. Nicole will need an additional hour for set-up and clean up.
